unnormalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kerala, filmmakers and cinephiles are flocking to celebrate the magic of cinema.
normalised: Lights, Camera, Festival! The entertainment world is buzzing with film festival fever! From Cannes to Kerala, filmmakers and cinephiles are flocking to celebrate the magic of cinema.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that the Jio MAMI Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a grand return later this year. Expect a heady mix of Bollywood glitz and indie gems, just like last time.
normalised: Word on the street is that the Jio M A M I Mumbai Film Festival is gearing up for a grand return later this year. Expect a heady mix of Bollywood glitz and indie gems, just like last time.

unnormalised: But it's not just the big names making waves. Smaller, regional festivals are popping up all over, showcasing diverse voices and stories. Think hidden talent ready for their big break.
normalised: But it's not just the big names making waves. Smaller, regional festivals are popping up all over, showcasing diverse voices and stories. Think hidden talent ready for their big break.

unnormalised: And speaking of breaks, attendees can recharge with amazing regional delicacies. Last year at a film fest in Kochi, everyone was raving about the Onam Sadhya served - absolutely divine!
normalised: And speaking of breaks, attendees can recharge with amazing regional delicacies. Last year at a film fest in Kochi, everyone was raving about the Onam Sadhya served - absolutely divine!

unnormalised: Rumours are swirling about potential collaborations between Indian filmmakers and international studios, spurred by connections made at these festivals.
normalised: Rumours are swirling about potential collaborations between Indian filmmakers and international studios, spurred by connections made at these festivals.

unnormalised: Plus, expect some serious fashion inspiration on the red carpets! Who will be wearing what? That's half the fun, right?
normalised: Plus, expect some serious fashion inspiration on the red carpets! Who will be wearing what? That's half the fun, right?

unnormalised: So, keep your eyes peeled for festival announcements near you. You might just discover the next big thing in Indian cinema... or at least enjoy some delicious biryani between screenings.
normalised: So, keep your eyes peeled for festival announcements near you. You might just discover the next big thing in Indian cinema... or at least enjoy some delicious biryani between screenings.
